title: Aged 16 to 64 years level 3 or above qualifications, Northern Ireland
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/northern-ireland-statistics-and-research-agency
summary: Percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) level 3+ qualifications, Northern Ireland, 2016 to 2023
description:
This dataset shows the percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) level 3+ qualifications, in Northern Ireland, for 2016 to 2023.

### Coverage 

Northern Ireland

#### Geography definition

Local Government Districts, 
Nation (Northern Ireland)

### Source

 - Northern Ireland: [Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency (NISRA)](https://www.nisra.gov.uk/publications/highest-qualification-level-2023) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
Figures produced by NISRA may differ slightly to other highest qualification levels statistical publications, either due to differing sources, age analysed or slight differences in methodologies for assigning highest qualifications levels.

measure.label: Aged 16 to 64 years level 3 or above qualifications

ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 with Level 3 or above qualifications
ess-beta-metadata.sourceOrg: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
